Literature.Title: Acremotins A-D, peptaibiotics produced by the soil-derived fungus Acremonium persicinum SC0105
Literature.Author: Wang C, Wu P, Yao L, Xue J, Xu L, Li H, Deng W, Wei X

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 6538(MIC=25µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus(MIC=50µg/ml),Shigella dysenteriae CMCC 51252(MIC=>100µg/ml),Salmonella typhimurium CMCC 50115(MIC=>100µg/ml),Escherichia coli ATCC 8739(MIC=>100µg/ml),Human lung carcinoma A549(IC50=14.4±1.85µM),Human cervical carcinoma HeLa(IC50=9.0±1.02µM),Human hepatocellular carcinoma HepG2(IC50=4.0±0.70µM)
